entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:28 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:28 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
